title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog remains open even after clicking the cancel button. The exception list is displayed despite the cancellation request.
EB: The progress dialog should close immediately upon clicking the cancel button, and the exception list should not be displayed.
SR:
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective.
2) Click the J! button to add an exception.
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
